issue.title: [C++] Make file/memory-mapped file interfaces threadsafe
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-508](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-508). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are a some functions which could be impacted by race conditions. In light of PARQUET-835 we will want to hold a lock in the appropriate places
